Baskervald X:
\usepackage[lf]{Baskervaldx} % lining figures
\usepackage[bigdelims,vvarbb]{newtxmath} % math italic letters from Nimbus Roman
\usepackage[cal=boondoxo]{mathalfa} % mathcal from STIX, unslanted a bit
\renewcommand*\oldstylenums[1]{\textosf{#1}}
Computer Modern:
\usepackage[OT1]{fontenc}
%% Do nothing else -- it's the default
Eurpopean Computer Modern:
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
%% Do nothing else -- it's the default
Kerkis:
\usepackage{kmath,kerkis} % The order of the packages matters; kmath changes the default text font
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
GFS Neohellenic:
\usepackage[default]{gfsneohellenic}
\usepackage[LGR,T1]{fontenc} %% LGR encoding is needed for loading the package gfsneohellenic
ScholaX:
\usepackage[p,osf]{scholax}
% T1 and textcomp are loaded by package. Change that here, if you want
% load sans and typewriter packages here, if needed
\usepackage{amsmath,amsthm}% must be loaded before newtxmath
% amssymb should not be loaded
\usepackage[scaled=1.075,ncf,vvarbb]{newtxmath}% need to scale up math package
% vvarbb selects the STIX version of blackboard bold.
Ibarra Real Nova:
\usepackage[lining]{ibarra} %% remove option 'lining' to get oldstyle figures as default
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Cantarell:
\usepackage[default]{cantarell} %% Use option "defaultsans" to use cantarell as sans serif only
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Chivo Light:
\usepackage[familydefault,light]{Chivo} %% Option 'familydefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Chivo Regular:
\usepackage[familydefault,regular]{Chivo} %% Option 'familydefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
URW Classico:
\usepackage[sfdefault]{classico} %% Option 'sfdefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Clear Sans:
\usepackage[sfdefault]{ClearSans} %% option 'sfdefault' activates Clear Sans as the default text font
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Computer Modern Sans Serif:
\usepackage[OT1]{fontenc}
\renewcommand*\familydefault{\sfdefault} %% Only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
European Computer Modern Sans Serif:
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\renewcommand*\familydefault{\sfdefault} %% Only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
Gandhi Sans:
\usepackage[lf,sfdefault]{gandhi} %% The 'sfdefault' option only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
GoSans:
\usepackage[sfdefault]{GoSans}  %% The 'sfdedault' option only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Open Sans:
\usepackage[default,oldstyle,scale=0.95]{opensans} %% Alternatively
%% use the option 'defaultsans' instead of 'default' to replace the
%% sans serif font only.
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Overlock:
\usepackage[sfdefault]{overlock} %% Option 'sfdefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Roboto:
\usepackage[sfdefault]{roboto}  %% Option 'sfdefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Roboto Condensed:
\usepackage[sfdefault,condensed]{roboto}  %% Option 'sfdefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Roboto Light:
\usepackage[sfdefault,light]{roboto}  %% Option 'sfdefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Roboto Light Condensed:
\usepackage[sfdefault,light,condensed]{roboto}  %% Option 'sfdefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Roboto Thin:
\usepackage[sfdefault,thin]{roboto}  %% Option 'sfdefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Rosario:
\usepackage[familydefault]{Rosario} %% Option 'familydefault' only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
Computer Modern Teletype:
\usepackage[OT1]{fontenc}
\renewcommand*\familydefault{\ttdefault} %% Only if the base font of the document is to be typewriter style
European Computer Modern Teletype:
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\renewcommand*\familydefault{\ttdefault} %% Only if the base font of the document is to be typewriter style
